name: The Chase: Cop Pursuit
summary:
The Chase is finally here. A thrilling and action-packed game that will have your heart racing! Prepare to unleash your inner speed monster as you take on the role of a driver who is being chased by the cops.

It's a challenging game in which you'll be immersed in a world of powered car races and exciting driving. Take control of a variety of customized cars and abilities, each with its own unique characteristics, and overcome your pursuers with your expert driving abilities. Explore smoothly created maps inspired by Eastern culture to give your escape ways a unique touch.

As you race through the maps you will come across power-ups that can give you a significant advantage in your daring escape. Keep an eye out for NOS to boost your car's speed and leave your pursuers in the dust. Additionally, strategically deploying mines can slow down police cars in order to earn victory.

Prepare to be on the edge of your seat with a captivating storyline that immerses you in danger, Can you escape the police? Prove your strength as an escape artist. Unlock additional characters to enrich your gameplay.
